mode.description: mode of activation: immediate (on message rx), scheduled_absolute (when internal clock >= requested_time), scheduled_relative (when internal clock >= time of message rx + requested_time)

requested_time.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating requested time (absolute or relative) for activation

scheduled_time.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating absolute time at which activation was scheduled (in case of scheduled_relative request scheduled_time is calculated as time of reception of request + requested_time)

status.description: status of activation (populated by system - waiting before scheduled activation is triggered, success once activation successfully completed, activate_in_progress if activation triggered but not yet completed, fail if activation failed for some internal reason, or error if the request is mal-formed)

message.description: Human readable message providing an explanation of any errors
